verses.verse: A Psalm of David. I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%>: Unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, will I sing praises <S%H2167><s%>.

I will behave myself wisely <S%H7919><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>: Oh when wilt thou come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H1980><s%>? I will walk within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> with a perfect <S%H8537><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>.

I will set <S%H7896><s%> no base <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: I hate <S%H8130><s%> the work <S%H6213><s%> of them that turn aside <S%H7750><s%>; It shall not cleave unto me <S%H1692><s%>.
A perverse <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from me <S%H3045><s%>: I will know no evil thing <S%H7451><s%>.

Whoso privily <S%H5643><s%> slandereth <S%H3960><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, him will I destroy <S%H6789><s%>: Him that hath a high <S%H1362><s%> look <S%H5869><s%> and a proud <S%H7342><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will I not suffer <S%H3201><s%>.

Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be upon the faithful <S%H539><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, that they may dwell <S%H3427><s%> with me <S%H1980><s%>: He that walketh in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall minister unto me <S%H8334><s%>.

He that worketh <S%H6213><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>: He that speaketh <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%> shall not be established <S%H3559><s%> before mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning will I destroy <S%H6789><s%> all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; To cut off <S%H3772><s%> all the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
